overview: Hosted By Elvira, Mistress of the Dark with The Greenhornes & The Black Belles live. Featuring Devil's Night at Third Man Records (a 30 minute documentary about the special Halloween event held at Third Man Records with Jack White and hosted by Elvira), and also includes a 4 song live concert set from The Black Belles and a 14 song concert set from The Greenhornes (featuring members of The Raconteurs and The Dead Weather).
title: Devil's Night
